about_the_game:
Easy-to-learn, but hard to master motocross game. Perform stunts, gain levels, upgrade your bike and spend resources on customization items of your choosing.

COMBO STUNTS



Complete levels and unlock new bikes. Choose from 10+ unique bikes, each with a different playstyle!

EXPLORE THE WORLD

From sunny beaches to bustling city streets and frozen lakes, race through various environments and uncover their secrets. Every level contains hidden collectibles to find.

FLAUNT YOUR GEAR

Spend your hard-earned coin to customize your character and your bike. Choose from 100+ different items and bike paintjobs to build your own look.

ASYNCHRONOUS MULTIPLAYER

Challenge your friends with your best performances. Duel with opponents in ranked 1v1 races or bigger 8-player tournaments.

TL;DR

  • 400+ Levels

  • 10+ Environments

  • Main tracks and harder bonus tracks

  • 1v1 Ranked mode, 8-player tournaments, friend challenges

  • 10+ Bikes with customizations

  • 50+ Character customization items

name: Stunt Bike Extreme

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Stunt Bike Extreme is a motocross racing game. Compete around the world through adrenaline-pumping tracks.
